Chain Lube Racing

₱410

RACING
Recommended for
sports bike, big bikes,
racing motorcycle and
also for track day
Categories: Motor Care, Performance & Maintenance
  • Description
  • Additional information

Description

Description

How to use:
Shake the bottle well.(Choose the
right chain lube for your motorcycle)
Clean your chain before applying the
chain lube
Let the chain lube rest to the chain
for at least 20minutes to soak the
chain lube into your chain.
Wipe it with a clean cloth

Additional information

Additional information

Size

250ml
